member.summary: This method is used to raise the RunReportCompleted event.

member.summary: Creates an instance of JasperServer. You should set the username and password if the server does not accept Windows Authentication
member.param: The url to the JasperServer ManagementService service (generally 'http://[hostname]:[port]/jasperserver/services/repository')

member.summary: Creates an instance of JasperServer.

The username used to login in JasperServer
The password used to login in JasperServer

member.summary: Runs a report on the JasperServer. This method outputs the report in the specified format at the specified path.
member.param: The images dir, used when output format is HTML
